entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then clearing. Local blowing snow this morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 29 January 2023
